  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card(Face front, Face retro, String type, int cardNumber, Color color)
      Constructor of the class which initializes all the attributes. The currentSide is set to the front face.
      Parameters:
      front - front face of the card.
      retro - retro face of the card.
      type - type of the card (e.g. resource, gold or starter).
      cardNumber - unique card's identifier.
      color - color of the card.

  • Method Details

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Getter of the type attribute.
      Returns:
      the type of the card.

    • getCardNumber

      public int getCardNumber()
      Getter of the cardNumber attribute.
      Returns:
      the card's id.

    • getColor

      public Color getColor()
      getter of the color attribute.
      Returns:
      the color of the card.

    • isNotBack

      public boolean isNotBack()
      Return whether the card is flipped or not.
      Returns:
      true if card is showing its front face.

    • setCurrentSide

      public void setCurrentSide()
      This method flips the card showing the opposite face. It changes the currentSide attribute.

    • getSymbols

      public List<Symbols> getSymbols()
      Getter of the List of symbols in the middle of the card.
      Returns:
      all the symbols in the middle of the card (if present).

    • checkCost

      public boolean checkCost(Player player)
      Checks if a player could afford the cost to place a card.
      Parameters:
      player - player to be checked.
      Returns:
      true only if the player can place the card.

    • calcPoints

      public void calcPoints(Player player)
      Calculates the points given by the card, and adds them to the player score.
      Parameters:
      player - player whose score is being calculated.

    • getCost

      public Integer[] getCost()
      Getter of the card's cost.
      Returns:
      the cost, in terms of symbols, necessary to place the card.

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints()
      Getter of the card's base points.
      Returns:
      the card's base points.

    • getCondition

      public Condition getCondition()
      Gets the condition to calculate the points when the card is placed.
      Returns:
      the condition (if present) to calculates points. For example 1 point for every visible quill.

    • getRequiredItem

      public Symbols getRequiredItem()
      Gets the item needed to place the card.
      Returns:
      the item needed to place the card.

    • getCorner

      public Corner getCorner(CornerEnum corner)
      Gets the corner in position.
      Parameters:
      corner - corner position (e.g. Top-Right).
      Returns:
      the corner in the wanted position.

    • getCornerSymbol

      public Symbols getCornerSymbol(CornerEnum corner)
      Getter of the symbol contained in a corner.
      Parameters:
      corner - the position of the corner we want to get the symbol.
      Returns:
      the symbol contained in that corner.

    • getCornerState

      public CornerState getCornerState(CornerEnum corner)
      Getter of the corner's state.
      Parameters:
      corner - the position of the corner we want to get the state.
      Returns:
      the corner's state.

    • setCornerState

      public void setCornerState(CornerEnum corner, CornerState state)
      Setter of the corner's state.
      Parameters:
      corner - position of the corner we want to set the state.
      state - the corner's state we want to set.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Card card)
      Checks if two cards are equals.
      Parameters:
      card - which we want to compare with this.
      Returns:
      true if the cards are equals.
